column4: Hi..I am trying to install Ubuntu...I don't get any video on the Try ubuntu without installing option.
tell me about your system hardware
ok  and how much system memory is on board?  also type the first few letters of the persons'  name and hit tab  so that they are alerted :)
check here or google  ubuntu bonjour printing   http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=156675
